exchange_rate_note: Bank exchange rates are the rates that banks charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates are the rates that independent foreign exchange dealers charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates are typically better for consumers because they are not subject to the same fees and charges as bank exchange rates.

add_many_products:
This step is optional; you can either complete it now or later when your Kwot store is approved. If you have your product details ready with you, we recommend completing this step now.
Here, you can provide details about your products. Add as many products as you can. A minimum of 1 product is required. We recommend that you add 10 or more products because more product means more chances to be discovered. You can edit your product details anytime.
add_product_or_skip: You are starting to add products to your store.You can stop at any stage of adding your product and come back later to finish it. There is no need to worry about losing your progress.
about_to_open_store:
You have finished setting up your Kwot store. We are verifying your information and will notify you soon.

Your Kwot store will be live for buyers, and you will be able to start selling once your store is verified. In the meanwhile, you can continue adding more products to your Kwot store.

price_inventory_info: The product price is listed in USD on KWOT and will be paid in local currency or USD. We use parallel exchange rates for payout. Bank exchange rates are the rates that banks charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates are the rates that independent foreign exchange dealers charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates are typically better for consumers because they are not subject to the same fees and charges as bank exchange rates.

affiliates_program_help: Kwot's Affiliates Program helps content creators, publishers, and bloggers
create_Affiliate_profile: Create your Affiliate profile with us by filling up the joining form and get started in a few minutes.
affiliate_profile_approved: Once your Affiliate profile is approved and you have the confirmation, you can begin recommending Kwot and back-linking to us.
start_paying_commission: We will start paying you commission based on the quality and quantity of the web traffic that you send us.
Kwot_affiliate_program: What is the Kwot Affiliate Program?
affiliate_program_offers: The Kwot Affiliate Program offers an opportunity for individuals and businesses to earn commission by promoting the Kwot marketplace and products. Kwot rewards affiliate partners by tracking the quality and quantity of the web traffic that they send to Kwot.
pay_fee_affiliate_program: Do I have to pay a fee to join the Affiliate program?
kwot_affiliate_program_free: No. The Kwot Affiliate program is Free. You don’t have to pay a fee to join the program. You need to generate traffic within 180 days of joining the program to maintain your status otherwise your affiliate privileges may be withdrawn by Kwot.
benefits_of_affiliate: What are the benefits of joining the Kwot Affiliate program?
affiliate_program_opportunity: The Kwot Affiliate program offers an opportunity for you to earn by promoting Kwot products and marketplace. You do not have to worry about customer service or about order processing as all of that will be taken care of by Kwot. All you need to do is promote Kwot and direct web traffic to Kwot.
kwot_affiliate_program: Who should join the Kwot Affiliate program?
affiliate_program_ideal_influencers: The Kwot Affiliate program is ideal for influencers, bloggers, and website or app owners. However, various other types of marketers such as email marketers may also find the program useful and rewarding. If you are interested in promoting Kwot products, you should give the Affiliate programs a try as it is free to join.
register_start_earning: Register with us to start earning money by promoting Kwot.
joined_affiliates_program: Congratulations, you have joined to Affiliates program
set_your_account: Set up your account and start enjoying the Kwot
edit_websites_mobile: Edit your websites and mobile apps
top_level_site_list: List all the top level websites and/or mobile apps on which you plan to display banners, widgets, Special Links,or other ads from Kwot Affiliates Program. You need to add at least one website or mobile app. You can add up to 50 websites or mobile apps.
following_describes_websites: Which of the following topics best describes your websites or mobile apps?

your_website_promote: What can users do on your website or mobile app, who is it for, and what kind of products do you intend to promote?

affiliates_agreement: of the Affiliates Program operating agreement
kwot_affiliates_program: Thank you for applying to the Kwot Affiliates Program
occasionally_Associate_ID: You may occasionally need to provide your Associate ID to verify your account with us. Your application will be reviewed shortly after you've referred qualified sales to Kwot.com
meantime_granted_Associates: In the meantime, you have been granted the full access to Associates Central 24 hours a day. If your affiliate links have not referred qualified sales after 180 days, your application and access to Associates Central will be withdrawn.
top_level_website_app: List all the top level websites and/or mobile apps on which you plan to display banners, widgets, Special Links, or other ads from Kwot Affiliates Program. You need to add at least one website or mobile app. You can add up to 50 websites or mobile apps.
chosen_affiliate_id: The chosen Affiliate ID will automatically be used to create your Affiliate account ID. For example, 'your site' can become tusitio-21, tusiti-21, site-21, etc.
online_marketplace_note: We are an online marketplace focused on original African products.
product_seller_note: We provide a platform for sellers of African products to market and sell their products globally with ease. With Kwot, sellers can rest assured that business operations including order processing, shipping, and inventory management can be handled in a cost effective and time efficient manner. Our integrated suite of marketplace offerings can help SMEs set up their e-commerce business for global markets.
multi_vendor_marketplace_note: We are an online multi-vendor marketplace that connects African sellers to buyers across the world.
e_commerce_platform_note: Kwot is the most comprehensive e-commerce platform of its kind for buyers of African products. We are committed to providing access to authentic African products for people across the world, including the African diaspora. We do this by providing a seamless experience to the users of Kwot and by enabling local producers of African products gain access to the global marketplace through a powerful yet easy-to-use technology platform.
buyer_product_note: We have built Kwot to delight sellers and buyers of African products, and we will keep launching new features on our platform to achieve this goal.
one_step_product: We aspire to be a one-stop shop for African products.
b2b_product: Kwot B2B Store - the one stop shop for all African products.
b2b_product_note: We have designed a customised platform for B2B buyers and sellers of African product so that they can buy and sell more efficiently.
become_a_seller: Do you want to become a seller?
products_across_kwot: Now, sell your products across the globe with Kwot. We provide you a powerful yet easy-to-use platform to enable you to maximise your market reach.
want_sell_on_Kwot: I want to sell on Kwot
b2b_online_market_place_note: Kwot B2B - the online marketplace for B2B buyers and sellers of African products has a global reach. Join us to expand your footprint globally.
expand_footprint: Expand your footprint to all corners of the globe with Kwot platform.
seller_buyer_needs_note: We understand that B2B sellers and buyers have different needs. Kwot B2B is designed keeping this in mind and so we enable you to sell more with less effort.
one_step_market_place_note: One-step e-commerce marketplace for buyers and sellers of African products.
single_administration_note: Single Window Administration for B2B & B2C Selling
product_b2b_b2c_note: Kwot allows you to list your products for B2B as well as B2C customers. This means that you can sell to both types of customers.
full_control_seller_note: Full control to sellers. You can design the storefront and update product offers.
buyer_seller_market_place_note: Kwot B2B marketplace is free for both buyers and sellers. Join today and enjoy the benefits, for free!
b2b_market_place_product_note: Kwot B2B marketplace is focused on authentic African products. If you are interested in African products, then you cannot give this platform a miss.
buyer_access_profile_note: B2B Buyers can access detailed profile of Sellers and view details of sellers' product certifications as well as production and quality control. Most sellers offer attractive volume discounts to attract bulk buyers.
single_profile_platform: Can I use a single profile to buy and sell on your platform?
individuals_seller_note: Yes, you can create and use your profile to buy as well as sell on the Kwot platform. Individuals, as well as SMEs, can create the seller profile by providing the relevant details.
seller_profile_note: How long does it take to create a seller profile? How much effort is required to manage it?
create_seller_profile_note: Creating a seller profile on Kwot and managing it is easy! It should take you about 5 minutes to create your profile if you have all the required information handy with you. Similarly, managing the seller profile is a simple process and most tasks can be accomplished within a few minutes.
seller_getting_order: Within how many days can sellers start getting customer orders? What support is available?
after_create_seller_profile_note: After you create your seller profile, your seller account will be approved and live within one business day. You will be able to receive and fulfil customer orders once your account is live. You will be able to use the advertising service offered by Kwot to promote your products and generate sales.
your_offer_service: What are the services that your offer to sellers?
seller_customisation_option: What are the customisation options available to sellers?
provide_powerful_seller_note: Kwot provides a powerful yet easy-to-use solution for sellers. The seller dashboard has details about your orders, inventories, and revenues.
store_name_logo_note: You can set up your Kwot store with your own unique name, brand logo, and banner image. The products in your store can be listed with photos, videos, and unique attributes such as color and material. Sellers can also provide order personalization options to buyers, e.g. message tags and gift wrapping.
measure_product_facilitate: How do you facilitate communication for made to measure products such as bespoke clothes?
body_measurement_note: On Kwot, we provide a body measurement tool for buyers that helps to take body measurements can remotely. This is useful for fashion vendors and made to measure clothes.
seller_discounts: Can sellers offer discounts on some products?
yes_seller_discounts: Yes, sellers can offer discounts on one or more products.
kwot_shipping_platform: How is shipping handled on the Kwot platform?
kwot_shipping_platform_note: Shipping is handled by DHL for order fulfilment because DHL provides reliable logistics support across the world.
hearing_for_you: We love hearing from you, so feel free to contact us.
understand_b2b_b2c_selling: We understand that B2B and B2C selling requires different solutions.
start_few_minutes: We can get you started in just a few minutes.
built_customised_marketplace: We have built a differentiated and customised marketplace for B2B sellers of African products. The platform is free to join.
create_kwot_account: Do I need to create a Kwot account to buy products on Kwot?
create_kwot_account_note: You can buy products on Kwot without creating an account by entering the mandatory details such as Shipping and Payment related. However, we recommend that you create a Kwot account for a better experience.
benefits_kwot_account: What are the benefits of creating a Kwot account?
benefits_kwot_account_note: Once you create a Kwot account, you will be able to track your order and view your order at the click of a button. Ordering products on Kwot will be faster and easier as you will not have to enter the Shipping and Payment details repeatedly. Moreover, a single account can be used to buy as well as sell on Kwot.
cancel_order_payment: Can I edit or cancel my order after making the payment?
cancel_order_payment_note: Yes, you can edit or cancel your order after making the payment. Your refund will be processed and credited back to your account. You can find further details about this in our Return policy.
return_receive_product: Can I return the product after I receive it?
return_receive_product_note: Yes, you can return the product after your receive it. You will be able to provide the reason for the return and get the requisite refund in your account. The return shipping can be handled by us. You can find further details about this in our Return policy.
provide_product_review: Can I provide a review for Kwot products?
provide_product_review_note: Yes, you can provide review for products on the Kwot platform. Your feedback provides us with encouragement and helps us to improve. We encourage you to provide honest feedback about the Kwot products.
How_can_contact_kwot_note: We are always available for our customers. You can contact us through the forms provided on the Feedback or Help & Contact page. You can also email us at admin@kwot.com
your_kwot_experience: How is your experience so far? What do you love about Kwot? What would you like us to improve or to include in future releases?”
appreciate_feedback: We really appreciate your feedback, it truly help us to improve.

measurements_using_mobile: Once payment is made, you will be asked to provide the measurements if you have them. And if you don't have them, we have got you covered with our remote body measuring application where you will scan your body using your mobile phone to capture and submit your measurements.

accept_purchase_conditions_note: I have read and acc the purchase conditions and understand the information on the user of my personal data explained in privacy policy
how_to_pack_note: Consider the weight, volume, value, and fragility of your product to decide upon the appropriate packaging. Do ensure that your package complies with the regulations, too. If you have shipped products to your customers through DHL before, you may already be aware of the norms tone followed.

subscription_join_note: Thanks for joining Kwot! We are excited to have you on board. Please select and pay for your preferred subscription plan. Once you have subscribed, you will be able to access our site and all its features.
subscription_join_things: Here are a few things to keep in mind: You will be charged every month on the same day that you subscribed. You can cancel your subscription at any time. If your have any questions or need help, feel free to contact us. We hope you enjoy our service!.
keep_things_title: Here are a few things to keep in mind:
keep_things_note_one: You'll be charged every month on the same day that you sign up.
keep_things_note_two: You can cancel your subscription at any time.
keep_things_note_three: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact us. We hope you enjoy our service!
already_active_subscription_note: You already have an active subscription.

withdrawal_frequency_note: This will trigger the withdrawal at the set frequency only when the available fund exceeds the set amount.
payment_option_note: Kwot Payments gives buyers the most payment options and gives you Kwot's seller protection.
vendor_dashboard_note: We have introduced the affiliate marketing on our platform. It's has by default been enabled for you with 5% commission. You can change it whenever you like.
renew_subscription: Your subscription has expired on KWOT. To renew your subscription, please
no_active_subscription_note: You are not on any active subscription. Please subscribe to activate your account and start using the platform, please
your_store_profile_profile: Your store's profile has been blocked
quick_note: Quick note: Always enter the latest amount we send-any deposit amounts we sent previously won’t work.
store_budget_note: Your budget is key to driving the most traffic possible to your store - it determines how often your ads are shown to buyers. You can change it anytime

discount_applied_note: The discount will be applied on the products.
custom_packages_note: The package sizes you use to ship your products are used when calculating shipping rates at checkout.

reach_more_buyers_with_ads: Reach more buyers with Kwot Ads
reach_more_buyers_with_ads_note: Kwot Ads makes your products more prominent in Kwot search, on category pages even on other product pages.
need_to_do_set_budget: All you need to do is set your budget and choose which product to promote.
stats_for_individual_advertised_products: Stats for your individual advertised products
success_ads_budget_note: Success! You’re now advertising with a budget of
ads_budget_sub_note: Your products now appear higher up in Kwot search results, which means you’re reaching more buyers searching for items like yours. It’s important to keep your budget the same during the first 30 days of your campaign so we can identify trends in your traffic and help drive the most visits possible to your store.
are_you_cancel_subscription: Are you sure you want to cancel subscription?
cancellation_affective: Cancellation will be affective at the end of your billing cycle.
restart_subscription_anytime: You can restart your subscription anytime.
enable_gift_wrap_price_for_store: Please enable gift wrap price for you store.

part_of_company_note: You are part of a company with several employees
individual_seller_note: You are one person selling small-scale products individually
input_otp_sent_mobile_number: Please input the OTP sent to your mobile number
identifies_address_note: Enter a name that identifies this address Eg:- House / Store / Warehouse
package_dimensions_shipping_note: Package dimensions is used to calculate shipping rates and package sizes. This could be different from the actual size of the product, as the product may be folded or compressed for shipping.
dimensions_product_import_note: 'The dimensions of a product are important in order to provide accurate information to customers and to ensure that the product will fit into the customer's desired space. The dimensions also affect the shipping cost of the product.
enabling_product_returnable: Enabling this will mark the product as returnable
platform_markup_automatically: Note:- A platform markup fee will be automatically added to the above price

editing_vendor_product: Warning! You are editing a vendor product.

product_required_measurements_note: Please enter all or only the measurements required for the product(s) you are buying. E.g. neck only for necklace or wrist only for wrist band or all measurements for clothing

click_here_to_read_the_new: Click here to read the new
payment_policy_text_1: This aspect of the business is concerned with how we intend to handle the payment process of each transaction that goes through our platform.
payment_policy_text_2: This policy will be made accessible to Vendors and KWOT management team for reference purposes and clarity as the case may be.
payment_policy_text_3: KWOT is partnering with both a local bank (STANBIC IBTC) and International Payment Solutions platforms (Paystack) for now, to ease the payment and funds transfer process for Vendors and ease tracking for KWOT admin.
payment_policy_text_4: KWOT has decided to use STANBIC IBTC as its Nigerian Settlement bank for each transaction completed with KWOT. As such, the following are key for each vendor upon sign-up with KWOT:
payment_policy_text_5: All vendors are advised to register with their Stanbic IBTC Account to receive payment
payment_policy_text_6: All vendors to ensure they onlyregister with their active accounts to receive funds.
payment_policy_text_7: Vendors are advised that the settlement date for a StanbicIBTC toStanbic IBTCaccount is T+ 1(Transaction date when amount was received from KWOT+ 1 day), while for other banks it is T+ 2(Transaction date when amount was received from KWOT+ 2days)or can be longer in peculiar cases.
the_end_to_end_vendor_payment_processing: the end-to-end vendor payment processing chain
payment_policy_text_8: At the end of each successfulpayment by the Buyer/ Once the funds have beenreceived in the KWOTReceiving Bank Account, the following chain is followed:
payment_policy_text_9: This is the typical processing time and may slightly vary in peculiar cases
payment_policy_text_10: When the BUYER has a refund request, the below chain is followed by VENDORS
explanation_refund_requests_handled_by_s: explanation on refund requests handled by seller
payment_policy_text_11: 1) For each refund request raised by a BUYER, the SELLER is to carry out his due diligence to ensure the claims for refund are genuine based on the KWOT RETURN POLICY. This presents 2 cases.
payment_policy_text_12: 2) In the case that after due diligence, the customer’s claims are wrong,the CUSTOMER is notified that NO REFUND will be processed.
payment_policy_text_13: 3) In the casetheCustomer’s claims are true with substantial evidence , Seller is to present 2 options to the CUSTOMER: To get a complete refund or to exchange for a similar item in good condition.
payment_policy_text_14: 4) Where the client opts for an immediate refund, the Seller forfeits the money for that transaction.
payment_policy_text_15: 5) Where the Customer opts for an exchange, the Seller’s funds are still unconfirmed until the Customer accepts the item given in exchange as being in good condition.
payment_policy_text_16: While KWOT has partnered with well experience payment solution partners, there could be occasional challenges faced. The following points are recommended:
payment_policy_text_17: 1) All bank details should be carefully and properlytyped in.
payment_policy_text_18: 2) For ease of settlement, the Vendors are advised to open an account with our Local Settlement Bank Partner.
payment_policy_text_19: 3) Vendor can cross-check their available balance in their wallets after each transaction holding period (2 days). For any discrepancies,it shouldbe escalated to KWOT admin/ helpdesk.
payment_policy_text_20: 4) For cases that involve a refund, the seller should immediately take ownership of the transaction and see to it that it is solved, or a refund made.
payment_policy_text_21: 5) In any case that involves an issue with the payment solution providers, the KWOT admin should be immediately contacted for a solution to be worked out.
payment_policy_text_22: 6) In no case should a vendor attempt to by-pass the usual money transfer process set by KWOT.
vendor_bank_account_details: vendor bank account details/ registration for kwot
ads_budget_note: We use your daily budget to promote your products and deliver the best results for your ad spend. Set a budget between $1 and $50 you can change it anytime.
budget_keep_note_one: A higher budget means we can show your ads more often in high-visibility places on Kwot.
budget_keep_note_two: To drive the best results, consider keeping your budget the same for the first 30 days.
start_kwot_ads_steps: Start Kwot Ads in just a few steps
kwot_ads_steps_note: Kwot Ads puts your products higher up in kwot search and other high-traffic placements on Kwot, so you can reach millions of interested buyers.
goals_for_shop: First, tell us your goals so we can drive the best results for your shop:
updates_related_financial_activity: Updates related to your financial activity
freshest_finds_and_latest_app_features: Freshest finds and latest app features
pending_final_approval_by_admin: Pending final approval by the admin
receive_proposal_from_vendors: You have yet to receive a proposal from vendors
